text: The second season of Power Couple premiered on Tuesday, April 18, 2017 at 10:30 p.m. on RecordTV.Segunda temporada do Power Couple Brasil estreia no dia 18 de abril The show features eleven celebrity couples living under one roof and facing extreme challenges that will test how well they really know each other. Each week, a couple will be eliminated until the last couple wins the grand prize. Nayara Justino & Cairo Jardim won the competition over MC Marcelly & Frank Cavalcante and Fábio Villa Verde & Regiane Cesnique with 65.07% of the public vote and took home the R$399.000 prize they accumulated during the show. Marcelly & Frank received a brand new car as the runners-up. ==Cast== ===Couples=== {| class= "wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center; margin:auto; align: center" |- ! width=135| Celebrity ! width=150| Occupation ! width=135| Partner ! width=150| Occupation ! width=115| Status |- | Carol Narizinho | Model | Mateus Boeira | Businessman | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 1st |- | Thaíde | Rapper & TV host | Ana Paula Onofre | Singer | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 2nd |- | Lorena Bueri | Model | Diego Cristo | Actor | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 3rd |- | Andressa Ganacin | Youtuber | Nasser Rodrigues | Illustrator | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 4th |- | Marcelo Zangrandi | Comedian | Júlia Zangrandi | Publicist | bgcolor=#fcf| Withdrew |- | Rafael Ilha | Singer | Aline Kezh | Housewife | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 5th |- | Sylvinho Blau-Blau | Singer | Ana Paula Pereira | Shoe designer | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 6th |- | Suyane Moreira | Actress | Mauricio Ribeiro | Actor | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 7th |- | Thaíde | Rapper & TV host | Ana Paula Onofre | Singer | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 8th |- | Fábio Villa Verde | Actor | Regiane Cesnique | Flight attendant | bgcolor=FBF373| Third place |- | MC Marcelly | Funk singer | Frank Cavalcante | Businessman | bgcolor=D1E8EF| Runner-up |- | Nayara Justino | Actress | Cairo Jardim | Businessman | bgcolor=73FB76| Winners |- |} ==Future appearances== After this season, in 2017, Marcelo Zangrandi (from Júlia & Marcelo) appeared in A Fazenda 9, he finished in 8th place. After this season, in 2018, Rafael Ilha (from Aline & Rafael) appeared in A Fazenda 10, where he won the competition. After this season, in 2020, Carol Narizinho (from Carol & Mateus) appeared in A Fazenda 12, she still in the competition. ==The game== ;Key {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:100%; line-height:13px;" |- | style="width:15%" | Men's challenge bet | style="width:15%" | Women's challenge bet | style="width:15%" | Total money combined | style="width:15%" | the challenge (adds the betting sum) | style="width:15%" | the challenge (deducts the betting sum) | style="width:15%" | Won couples' challenge (immunity and adds R$20.000) |} ===Challenges' results=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%; width:100%; line-height:15px;" |- ! rowspan=2 colspan=2| Least money (post-challenge) | bgcolor=959FFD| Marcelly Frank | bgcolor=959FFD| Thaíde Ana P. | Lorena Diego | Nayara Cairo | Andressa Nasser | bgcolor=FF9999| Carol Mateus | Sylvinho | Thaíde Ana P. | Fábio Regiane | Marcelly Frank |- | Fábio Regiane | Andressa Nasser | colspan=8 bgcolor=A9A9A9| |} ====Notes==== * * * * * ===Special power=== For the first five weeks, the Couple's challenge winners randomly will pick two out of eight envelopes of the following colors: yellow, orange, grey, green, pink, blue, white and red. Then, the couple will be given a choice between two advantages in the game. The couple's choice is marked in bold. ;Results {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%; width:100%; line-height:13px;" |- ! style="width:05%" | Week ! style="width:15%" | Couples' challenge winners ! style="width:50%" | Advantages |- ! 1 | Lorena & Diego | * Give Immunity to another couple the following week. * An extra vote at this week's Elimination ceremony. |- ! 2 | Suyane & Mauricio | * Give a couple an advantage at the next Men & Women's challenges → Sylvinho & Ana Paula. * Ban a couple from compete in next week's Couple's challenge. |- ! 3 | Fábio & Regiane | * Cancel another couple's vote → Andressa & Nasser. * A sole vote counted as two at this week's Elimination ceremony. |- ! 4 | Marcelly & Frank | * Chose a couple to have next week's sum of money reduced. * Cancel this week's Elimination. |- ! 5 | Suyane & Mauricio | * Chose a couple to have next week's sum of money reduced. * Ban a couple from compete in next week's Couple's challenge → Sylvinho & Ana Paula. |- |} ===Voting history=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:85%; width:100%; line-height:13px;" |- ! rowspan=2 style="width:11.0%" | ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 1 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 2 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 3 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 4 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 5 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 6 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 7 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 8 ! rowspan=2 style="width:06.5%" | Week 9 ! colspan=2 style="width:13.0%" | Week 10 |- ! style="width:06.5%" | Top 4 ! style="width:06.5%" | Finale |- ! Withdrew | colspan=6| | bgcolor=#fcf| Marcelo Júlia | colspan=4| |- ! rowspan=3| Eliminated | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Carol Mateus | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Thaíde Ana P. | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Lorena Diego | bgcolor=CCCCCC rowspan=3| Elimination cancelled | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Andressa Nasser | bgcolor=EE82EE rowspan=3| Thaíde Ana P. | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Rafael Aline | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Sylvinho | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Suyane Mauricio | bgcolor=FA8072 rowspan=3| Thaíde Ana P. | bgcolor=FBF373 rowspan=1| Fábio Regiane 12.18% |- | bgcolor=D1E8EF rowspan=1| Marcelly Frank 22.75% |- | bgcolor=73FB76 rowspan=1| Nayara Cairo 65.07% |- |} ====Notes==== * : Lorena & Diego played their extra vote, therefore ten votes were cast in total. * : Fabio & Regiane had to pick one couple to have their vote cancelled. Andressa & Nasser were chosen after the votes were cast, nullifying their vote for Suyane & Mauricio. * : Marcelly & Frank chose to cancel this week's elimination, nullifying all the votes cast. * : Instead of permanent elimination, the first four eliminated couples received a chance to return to the game through a series of competitions known as Wildcard round. * : Before Week 7's elimination ceremony, Marcelo suffered a cardiac arrhythmia. Unable to perform in the physical challenges of the game, Marcelo & Julia left the house. * : The final Couples' Challenge losing couple would be automatically eliminated. However, host Justus revealed that the results would be delivered only during the live final. * : Following the live final elimination, the public votes for the couple they want to win Power Couple Brasil. == Ratings and reception == ===Brazilian ratings=== All numbers are in points and provided by Kantar Ibope Media. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%; width: 100%" ! rowspan=2 width="05.0%" | Week ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | First air date ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | Last air date ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | Timeslot (BRT) ! colspan=2 width="20.0%" | Daily SP viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="10.0%" | SP viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="10.0%" | BR viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="05.0%" | Ref. |- ! width="10%" | Tuesday ! width="10%" | Thursday |- | 1 | April 18, 2017 | April 20, 2017 | rowspan=10 | Tuesday & Thursday 10:30 p.m. | 6.8 | 5.8 | 6.3 | 6.5 | |- | 2 | April 25, 2017 | April 27, 2017 | 6.4 | 8.3 | 7.3 | 7.1 | |- | 3 | May 2, 2017 | May 4, 2017 | 6.3 | 7.6 | 6.9 | 7.0 | |- | 4 | May 9, 2017 | May 11, 2017 | 6.7 | 7.3 | 7.0 | 7.3 | |- | 5 | May 16, 2017 | May 18, 2017 | 7.6 | 7.0 | 7.3 | 7.5 | |- | 6 | May 23, 2017 | May 25, 2017 | 7.0 | 7.5 | 7.2 | 7.4 | |- | 7 | May 30, 2017 | June 1, 2017 | 7.9 | 8.1 | 8.0 | 7.9 | |- | 8 | June 6, 2017 | June 8, 2017 | 7.1 | 9.7 | 8.3 | 8.1 | |- | 9 | June 13, 2017 | June 15, 2017 | 7.2 | 8.2 | 7.7 | 7.8 | |- | 10 | June 20, 2017 | June 22, 2017 | 7.7 | 7.9 | 7.8 | 8.1 | |- |} * ==References== == External links == * Power Couple 2 on R7.com Category:2017 Brazilian television seasons
